entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 14. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Clearing this morning. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this morning. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 34 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Light snow. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then light snow. Wind becoming south 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023
